item.title: YouTuber music group Melon Parker visual novel Melon Parker: Kimi ga Nandemo Bu no Buchou-san! announced for PS4, Switch, PC, iOS, and Android
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • Smartphone
  • Switch

Due out on November 27.

CyberStep visual novel game brand Rabbitfoot has announced Melon Parker: Kimi ga Nandemo Bu no Buchou-san!, a fully voiced visual novel starring YouTuber music group Melon Parker for PlayStation 4, Switch, PC (Steam), iOS, and Android. It will launch on November 27 with English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, and other language support. A physical edition will also be available for Switch in Japan.

Here is the story synopsis:

You and your five childhood friends—Naroya, Samurai Sho, Soraneko, KAITO, and kamome—are members of the “Everything Club” at Melon Pan Private High School.

While cheerfully resolving the incidents that arise at school and enjoying everyday life, you suddenly find yourselves performing at a music festival!?

Can the “Everything Club” succeed in pulling off a big event like a music festival stage?

And where will your coming-of-age story with your five childhood friends lead…?

Visit the official website here.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/youtuber-music-group-melon-parker-visual-novel-melon-parker-kimi-ga-nandemo-bu-no-buchou-san-announced-for-ps4-switch-pc-ios-and-android

item.title: Hotel Barcelona – Gamescom 2025 trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out on September 26.

Publisher CULT Games and developer White Owls have released the Gamescom 2025 trailer for “2.5D slasher film parodic action” game Hotel Barcelona.

Here is an overview of the game, via CULT Games:

About

A deranged blend of horror, action, and grindhouse aesthetics, Hotel Barcelona invites players into a luxury hotel-turned-slaughterhouse where America’s most depraved serial killers await. When rookie U.S. Marshal Justine crashes near the hotel grounds, she’s pulled into a terrifying reality—and forced to unleash the monster lurking inside her mind: Dr. Carnival.

Developed by White Owls and published by Cult Games, this 2.5D side-scrolling action experience blends stylish slasher combat with over-the-top boss encounters, dripping atmosphere, and cooperative mayhem.

Key Features

  • A Floor for Every Fear – Fight your way through horror-themed hotel floors crawling with serial killers, each inspired by VHS-era horror icons. Expect jump scares, surreal twists, and buckets of blood.
  • A Killer Split Personality – Justine’s mind isn’t her own. Dr. Carnival, the ancient entity inside her, grants devastating powers—if you’re willing to pay the price.
  • Death is Only the Beginning – When you die, your past self becomes a shadowy ally. Each run builds strength and unleashes ghostly vengeance in this twisted take on rogue-lite mechanics.
  • Cooperative Carnage – Bring backup. Up to four players can check in together for bloody online multiplayer action.

Hotel Barcelona is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on September 26.

Watch the trailer below.

Gamescom 2025 Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/hotel-barcelona-gamescom-2025-trailer
